## Vector.dot() function

Compute the dot product of two non-empty, equal length vectors.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot\_product](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot_product)

**Signature:**

```typescript
function dot(v: Vector, u: Vector): number;
```
